Summary: Several orange glowing objects entered the atmosphere at a high rate of speed, then came to immediate halt, formed a line, turned into "air-plane lights" then dissapated.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside on a clear night, on my porch swing, talking on my phone. I saw several orange glowing objects enter the atmosphere towards the direction of the ocean, at a high rate of speed, like falling stars, then came to an immediate halt, formed a line, as several more appeared and joined in the "formation", then glows faded out, to be replaced by what looked like airplane lights, and each object went off i a different direction. I was in awe and excited.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Murrells Inlet
There were no other sightings in Murrells Inlet on or around August 3rd 2009
